title: Breastfeeding Motivation Instructional Design: ARCS Model-Based Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental parenting knowledge and understanding of instructional design
context.additional_context: An educational course for adult learners conducted as part of a corporate social contribution program, with supplementary materials available via digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can apply ARCS model motivation strategies to breastfeeding education and develop specific instructional design plans
Learners can analyze real-world cases related to the physiological/psychological benefits of breastfeeding and reconstruct them into educational content.
Learners can develop project-based evaluation criteria for assessing the effectiveness of breastfeeding education.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
